title: Malta News Briefing – Saturday 4 January 2025
description: Malta News Briefing – Saturday 4 January 2025Morning Briefing Major increases in financial services fees revealed New legal notices have introduced higher fees for banks, insurance providers, and financial services companies in Malta. The eight notices amend regulations governing sectors such as retirement funds, banks, trusts, and crypto assets.
